content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@microdata23.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.newgolds (
	[customer_id] int,
	[first_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[total_balance] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'delta/gold_delta/part-00000-f135a876-1943-4ab3-b87c-edd121d5224d.c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.newgolds
GO
